channel.title: Community on BennuGD
channel.description: Recent content in Community on BennuGD

item.title: GIVEAWAY! eXplosive Dinosaurs is giving away 3 merchandise sets
item.description: Jarl is a comical top-down arcade game made in BennuGD by our forum user Futu-Block where the character has to finish the level avoiding all kind of obstacles. It is available for download at: http://www.mediafire.com/file/sguk7a8yfcxhvc4/jarl.rar An, as usual, you can leave your feedback at: http://forum.bennugd.org/index.php/topic,4674.msg73172.html (only in spanish)
